content:
J.Crew offers a student discount program that provides 15% off all purchases for students with a valid .edu email address. Here are the details:

**J.Crew Student Discount Program:**

1. **Eligibility:** The student discount is available to students with a valid .edu email address. This includes students at accredited colleges, universities, and online institutions.
2. **Discount:** Students receive 15% off all purchases made on jcrew.com, in J.Crew stores, or through the J.Crew mobile app.
3. **How to sign up:** To sign up, simply create a J.Crew account using your .edu email address. You'll receive an email with a unique promo code to use at checkout.
4. **Verification:** J.Crew may request verification of your student status at any time. You may be asked to provide a valid student ID, transcript, or other documentation to confirm your eligibility.
5. **Exclusions:** The student discount cannot be combined with other offers, promotions, or discounts. It's also not valid on gift cards, previous purchases, or certain excluded items.
6. **In-store purchases:** To receive the discount in-store, simply show your valid student ID and .edu email address at the time of purchase.

**Tips:**

1. **Use your .edu email address:** Make sure to use your .edu email address when creating your J.Crew account to ensure you receive the student discount.
2. **Keep your account up-to-date:** If your .edu email address changes, update your J.Crew account to ensure you continue to receive the discount.
3. **Stack with other offers:** While the student discount can't be combined with other promo codes, you can still earn J.Crew Rewards points and receive other benefits.
4. **Share with friends:** If you have friends who are also students, spread the word about J.Crew's student discount program!

By taking advantage of J.Crew's student discount program, you can enjoy 15% off your purchases and stay stylish on a budget. Happy shopping!
